name: FRigUnit_SwitchParent
doc: Switches an element to a new parent.

Mode:
Depending on this the child will switch to the world,
       * back to its default or to the item provided by the Parent pin
Child: The child to switch to a new parent
Parent: The optional parent to switch to. This is only used if the mode is set to 'Parent Item'
bMaintainGlobal:
If set to true the item will maintain its global transform,
       * otherwise it will maintain local
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
